participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Introverted and observant, Ethan enjoys quiet activities that allow him to reflect on life.
participant_1.background: In my freetime I enjoy cloud watching. My idea of flirting is to stare from a distance. My favorite singer is Jacob Sartorius. I work a dead end 9 to 5 job as a snakeskin oil salesman. My favorite store to shop at is Costco.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and sociable, Sofia thrives in environments where she can connect with others and enjoys vibrant conversations.
participant_2.background: I collect single malt scotch. During the week I go to college to become a lawyer. I tend bar on the weekends. I listen to blues and jazz. I live in a tiny house to save money.

content.text: What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to listen to music, especially blues and jazz.
Cool, I like blues and jazz too!
Who's your favorite artist?
I like Louis Armstrong, Ella Fitzgerald, and Miles Davis.
Nice! I love Miles Davis too.
I also like to go cloud watching.
That's a unique hobby! What do you like about it?
I like the way the clouds look and the way they change.
I can see why you like it. Clouds are pretty amazing.
So what do you do for work?
I'm a student during the week and I tend bar on the weekends.
That's interesting! What are you studying?
I'm studying to be a lawyer.
Oh, cool! I've always thought about going to law school.
It's a lot of work, but it's worth it if you want to be a lawyer.
I can imagine. So what do you like about being a bartender?
I like the interaction with people and the tips.
I can see why you like that. I like getting to know new people.
Me too. It's a lot of fun.
So what's your favorite thing to do when you're not working or studying?
I like to hang out with my friends, go to concerts, and read.
That sounds like a lot of fun.
It is! I like to keep busy.
Me too. I have a lot of hobbies that I like to keep me busy.
That's good. It's important to have things to do.
I agree.
